name: Mega 65 Toxic Frenzy
description:
CONTROLS

Use Joystick in Port 2 on your Mega 65 or Emulator

Move left and right to catch the falling toxic drips before they hit the floor and catch fire!

Dump the contents to the guy on the next level with a barrel before your bucket is too full. Take care to not drop it on the customers below!

This is the Mega 65 version of Toxic Frenzy ported by Shallan50k.

CREDITS

Developed by Jason Oakley / Blue Bilby
